description: A two hour ski ahead. You get dressed and reach for a reliable shield from the elements. Designed to be a simple feature-rich softshell that is light, breathable and functional, this cross-country jacket is as comfortable doing dusk laps on freshly groomed snow as it is running on cool, dark nights. For those that value versatility and performance in their cross-country kit.
name: Odlo Brensholmen Jacket - Mens
